name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior AI Engineer with over 13 years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face**. Expertise in building and deploying advanced predictive models, leveraging frameworks such as **Pandas**, **NumPy**, and **LangChain** to drive AI/ML initiatives. Proven track record in MLOps, managing the entire lifecycle from model training and serving to orchestration with **MLflow** and **Airflow**.

Skilled in implementing comprehensive data privacy and AI ethics strategies, ensuring compliance with emerging standards. Deep understanding of compliance frameworks, aligning systems with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 requirements. Beyond technical skills, I bring exceptional problem-solving capabilities, strong communication skills, and a collaborative approach to agile project management.

Designed and optimized data workflows for real-time analytics in healthcare and fintech domains, employing advanced frameworks and libraries for high performance and scalability.
Created and maintained full-stack applications in Python (FastAPI) and **JavaScript** (React and Node.js), with a focus on robust data handling and security protocols for handling sensitive information.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning models and enhance software products, delivering solutions in a timely manner while adhering to Agile methodologies.
Conducted thorough testing and validation of models using Open Source tools to ensure reliability and efficacy in production environments.
Mentored junior engineers on best practices in AI development, data handling, and ethical considerations in line with **Data Privacy** principles.

Facilitated knowledge sharing sessions on **MLOps**, emerging technologies, and industry trends to maintain team and project alignment with the latest advancements in AI and data science.

Leveraged **Python** and **TensorFlow** to develop predictive models, enhancing decision-making through advanced analytics and machine learning processes.
Utilized **Pandas** and **NumPy** for efficient data manipulation and analysis, ensuring high-quality data input for AI applications and models.

Adhered to **MLOps** principles for managing the machine learning lifecycle, including version control, continuous integration, and deployment, ensuring scalable and maintainable AI solutions.
Promoted data privacy and AI ethics in all project developments, ensuring compliance with regulatory standards and safeguarding user information during model training and deployment.
Led agile project management methodologies to enhance team collaboration, resulting in a **30%** reduction in project delivery times across multiple AI initiatives.
Executed a series of A/B tests yielding insights from **500+** user interactions to refine predictive models, increasing accuracy rates by **25%** based on performance analytics.

Utilized **Python** along with **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Hugging Face** to develop advanced **LLM** (Large Language Model) solutions, driving innovation in AI-driven customer interactions and personalization.
Engineered predictive models leveraging **Pandas** and **NumPy** to analyze large datasets, ensuring data-driven decision-making in product recommendations and user engagement strategies.
Implemented **MLOps** practices for model deployment and monitoring, ensuring efficient lifecycle management of AI solutions through continuous integration and delivery pipelines.
Executed data privacy strategies in compliance with **GDPR**, ensuring secure handling and processing of user data while adhering to established **AI Ethics** guidelines.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, participating in sprint planning and retrospectives to continuously improve processes and deliver high-quality AI features.
Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.

Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3 + Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG **2.1**).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
